text: I walk into the bakery and instantly feel a sense of unease.
Despite the chaos of the upturned building, the scent of baked bread still wafts through the air.
At least I think that should be bread. It’s a bright shade of red.
I look down at the floor.
Several baskets of “bread” and other desserts line the floor, with several with visible foot sized craters in them.
As I lean down to jot down the apparent foot size of our suspect, I notice that the floor is completely free of dirt, dust or grime.
Looking up towards the walls, I realize that this bakery is completely sterile.
Despite the woodsy looking interior, this building is more akin to a hospital than it is a bakery. Odd.
I stand back up to face the culty contraption I’ve dubbed Gabo.
Hm, they really did a number on this joint. Anything else you could tell me about the guy who did this?
speaker: det

text: YOU LACK THE PROPER CREDENTIALS IN ORDER TO ACCESS THAT INFORMATION
speaker: gabotop

text: What? Hey pal, I’m just trying to h-
speaker: det

text: CREDENTIALS MAY BE ACQUIRED BY-
speaker: gabotop

text: ‘Btzz’
speaker: gabotop

text: by becoming an initiate in the cyberdough church.
speaker: gabotop

text: (sigh)
speaker: det

text: And that requires me to do…?
speaker: det

text: Young one, all you need to do to be accepted into the church is to-
speaker: gabotop

text: ‘Btzz’
speaker: gabotop

text: COLLECT [5/5] FOOD ITEMS OFF THE FLOOR-
speaker: gabotop

text: ‘Btzz’
speaker: gabotop

text: and with that, access to all information in the great church will be at your disposal
speaker: gabotop

text: Alright, fine. I’ll do it.
speaker: det
